concept.title: Character Representation Of Real Numbers Overview
concept.shortdesc: Defines the format of a real number type when it is converted into a string.

section.title: Architectural relationships
section.p: A format defined using this API is passed to descriptor functions that convert real numbers to strings.

section.title: Description
section.p: The character representation of real numbers specifies aspects of number formatting such as number of decimal places, number of significant digits, and standard or scientific format.
The API is provided by the TRealFormat.
